article.title: Guardian of the HAN: Thwarting Mobile Attacks on Smart-Home Devices Using OS-level Situation Awareness

multiple_choice_question.text: Which category of IoT products constitutes the largest portion of those analyzed in this study?
In the setup phase of WiFi devices, what action is typically initiated by the user pressing a specific sequence of buttons on the device?
choices: The device connects to the HAN WiFi network.
The device creates a micro access point and advertises its SSID.
The user inputs the HAN WiFi credentials to the app.
The app searches for the advertised SSID and guides the user to select the device network.

multiple_choice_question.text: During the communication phase, which method of controlling IoT devices requires a constant internet connection and may lead to latency issues?
choices: The app connects directly to the device through WiFi.
The app connects to the cloud service of the device.
The user sends commands through a tethered connection.
The device utilizes a no-network mode to receive commands.

multiple_choice_question.text: What information does the control message NOT contain?
choices: An identifier for the detected flow
